name: Minesweeper: Logic Puzzles
description:
Play Minesweeper today! Minesweeper is the classic challenging logic game of numbers. Clear the board without clicking on any bombs!

Train your brain every day and become a math master by playing Minesweeper!

Features of Minesweeper by Block Puzzle Games:
- THOUSANDS of puzzles, all free!
- 3 difficulty modes: Easy, Medium, Hard
- Flag squares you think are bombs
- Play without wifi
- Save your progress automatically and continue your game later!
